TEXT.English: Diplomacy is not possible with the minor %s1_CivName
TEXT.French: La diplomatie n'est pas possible avec la Civilisation mineure %s1_CivName
TEXT.German: Diplomatie ist mit der kleinen Civ %s1_CivName nicht möglich
TEXT.Italian: Non sono possibili relazioni diplomatiche con la Civiltà Minore: %s1_CivName
TEXT.Spanish: No es posible la diplomacia con la civilización menor: %s1_CivName
TEXT.Finnish: Diplomacy is not possible with the minor %s1_CivName

TEXT.English: Disables the Revolution mod component: new rebel civs will not attempt to breakaway from an empire if their needs are not being met.
TEXT.French: Désactive le composant de mod de révolution : les nouveaux civs rebelles ne peuvent pas se révolter et devenir indépendante d'un empire si leurs besoins ne sont pas satisfaits.
TEXT.German: Deaktiviert Sie den Revolution-MOD-Baustein: rebellen neue Zivilisationen nicht, sich von einem Imperium abzuspalten, wenn ihre Bedürfnisse nicht erfüllt werden.
TEXT.Italian: Disabilita il MOD "Revolution" : nuove civiltà ribelli no possono tentare la secessione da un impero se i loro bisogni non vengono soddisfatti.
TEXT.Spanish: Deactivado componente de Revolution Mod: Nuevas civilizaciones rebeldes no intentarán independizarse de un imperio si sus necesidades no son satisfechas (Mod)
TEXT.Finnish: Disables the Revolution mod component: new rebel civs will not attempt to breakaway from an empire if their needs are not being met.

TEXT.English: If a civilization already owns a holy city, they cannot found a new religion.
TEXT.French: Une civilization qui possède déjà une Ville Sainte ne peut pas fonder une autre religion.
TEXT.German: If a civilization already owns a holy city, they cannot found a new religion.
TEXT.Italian: If a civilization already owns a holy city, they cannot found a new religion.
TEXT.Spanish: If a civilization already owns a holy city, they cannot found a new religion.
TEXT.Finnish: If a civilization already owns a holy city, they cannot found a new religion.

TEXT.English: Disables the BarbarianCivs: Barbarian cities which are left alone will remain barbarian, they will not spawn new civilizations.
TEXT.French: Désactive les Civs Barbares: Les Villes Barbares ne feront pas émerger de nouvelles civilizations.
TEXT.German: Disables the BarbarianCivs: Barbarian cities which are left alone will remain barbarian, they will not spawn new civilizations.
TEXT.Italian: Disables the BarbarianCivs: Barbarian cities which are left alone will remain barbarian, they will not spawn new civilizations.
TEXT.Spanish: Disables the BarbarianCivs: Barbarian cities which are left alone will remain barbarian, they will not spawn new civilizations.
TEXT.Finnish: Disables the BarbarianCivs: Barbarian cities which are left alone will remain barbarian, they will not spawn new civilizations.

TEXT.English: Disables TechDiffusion: tech knowledge will not slowly diffuses to civs that are behind.
TEXT.French: Désactive la Diffusion des Techs : La Connaissance des Technologies ne sera pas diffusée aux autres civilisations.
TEXT.German: Disables TechDiffusion: tech knowledge will not slowly diffuses to civs that are behind.
TEXT.Italian: Disables TechDiffusion: tech knowledge will not slowly diffuses to civs that are behind.
TEXT.Spanish: Disables TechDiffusion: tech knowledge will not slowly diffuses to civs that are behind.
TEXT.Finnish: Disables TechDiffusion: tech knowledge will not slowly diffuses to civs that are behind.

TEXT.English: Enable the DynamicCivNames mod component: renames civs based on their civics and other properties. Only works in English.
TEXT.French: Lorques activé, attribue un Nom dynamique aux civilisations correspondant à leurs propriétés et comportement (noms générés en anglais). Exemples : tribu xxx, royaume xxx, Empire xxx.
TEXT.German: Aktivieren Sie den DynamicCivNames-MOD-Baustein: benennt Civs basierend auf ihre Staatsformen und sonstige Eigenschaften um. Funktioniert nur auf englisch einwandfrei.
TEXT.Italian: Attiva il componente "Definizioni Dinamiche" (DynamicCivNames): rinomina le civiltà in base a forma di governo ed altre proprietà (in inglese).
TEXT.Spanish: Activado componente de Revolution Mod: Renombra las civilizaciones basandose en sus principios y otras propiedades (Mod)
TEXT.Finnish: Enable the DynamicCivNames mod component: renames civs based on their civics and other properties. Only works in English.

TEXT.English: All players start as minor civs, meaning they are at war with everyone. Your civ will settle into a full civ and you'll be able to conduct diplomacy after you discover Writing.
TEXT.French: Tous les joueurs commencent en tant que civilisations mineures, et sont automatique en guerre contre tous les autres. Votre civilisation sortira de la barbarie et pourra conduire des actions diplomatiques après la découverte de l'écriture.
TEXT.German: Alle Spieler beginnen als kleine Civ, wodurch sie sich mit allen anderen im Kriegszustand befinden. Ihre Civ wird sich in eine vollwertige Civ verwandeln und Diplomatie ermöglichen, sobald Sie die Schrift entdecken.
TEXT.Italian: Tutti i giocatori cominciano come civs secondari, significanti sono alla guerra con tutto. Il vostro civ si depositerà in un civ e in un you' pieni il ll può condurre la diplomazia dopo che scoprite la scrittura.
TEXT.Spanish: Todos los jugadores empiezan como civilizaciones menores, lo que significa que están en guerra con todos los demás. Tu civilización podrá asentarse como una verdadera civilización y usar la diplomacia después del descubrimiento de la escritura (Mod).
TEXT.Finnish: All players start as minor civs, meaning they are at war with everyone. Your civ will settle into a full civ and you'll be able to conduct diplomacy after you discover Writing.

TEXT.French: +%d1_Change[ICON_UNHAPPY]: " Vous avez refusé de répondre favorablement à notre demande! "
TEXT.Italian: +%d1_Change[ICON_UNHAPPY]: " Avete rifiutato di assegnare la nostra richiesta! "

TEXT.French: +%d1_Change[ICON_HAPPY]: "Notre rébellion a été couronnée de succès"
TEXT.Italian: +%d1_Change[ICON_HAPPY]: " La nostra ribellione è stata successful"

TEXT.English: The %s1_CivName have decided to give up their independence and join the %s2_CivName!
TEXT.French: Les %s1_CivName ont décidé d'abandonner leur indépendance et de joindre %s2_CivName!
TEXT.German: Die %s1_CivName haben sich entschieden, ihre Unabhängigkeit aufzugeben und sich den %s2_CivName anzuschließen!
TEXT.Italian: Il %s1_CivName hanno deciso di dare in su la loro indipendenza e di unire %s2_CivName!
TEXT.Spanish: Los %s1_CivName han decidido renunciar a su independencia y unirse a %s2_CivName!
TEXT.Finnish: The %s1_CivName have decided to give up their independence and join the %s2_CivName!
